name: Simple Solitaire 2 Suits
description:
If you like solitaire games, you're going to love this app!

This solitaire game use 2 suits of cards and plus the ability to control card movements naturally by just swiping or tapping the cards.

Think you have the best solitaire score around? You can check the Game Center leaderboard to see how your solitaire skills stack up against players all around the world!

* Unlimited hints
* Unlimited undo
* Klondike
* Custom backgrounds
* Auto complete
* Statistics
